scripts.free-tier:deploy:production: cdk deploy PortfolioFreeTierProduction --require-approval never --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
scripts.free-tier:deploy:development: cdk deploy PortfolioFreeTierDevelopment --require-approval never --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
scripts.free-tier:synth:staging: cdk synth PortfolioFreeTierStaging --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
scripts.free-tier:synth:production: cdk synth PortfolioFreeTierProduction --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
scripts.free-tier:diff:staging: cdk diff PortfolioFreeTierStaging --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
scripts.free-tier:diff:production: cdk diff PortfolioFreeTierProduction --app npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/free-tier-app.ts
